# R Best Practices 

Today's R session is going to be a review of best practices when working on a project in R. This is meant to serve as both an overview of the purpose and benefits of R, with a technical deep dive on iterations at the end. 

Agenda: 
1. Why R? 
2. Best Practices Principles 
3. Version control 
4. Object Oriented Programming 
5. Functional Programming 
6. Iterations
